Author: MetaEsoTeric
Text: aww no worries, you're just as much of an important person in my life if not more so thank *you*, so much.

Author: ItsLilly22
Text: We’re not “SOs” but we’re friends and you’re the only one I’ve opened up to about my issues so I just wanted to say thank you for listening to my rambles all the time and somehow always saying the right things, it means a lot to me and I think everyone on this sub deserved to have someone like you. u/MetaEsoTeric.
